document: THERMALLY INDUCED TWO-~PHASE FLOW INSTABILITIES, INCLUDING THE EFFECT OF THERMAL NON-EQUILIBRIUM BETWEEN THE PHASES A THESIS Presented to The Faculty of the Division of Graduate Studies and Research by Pradip Saha In Partial Fulfillment of the Requirements for the Degree Doctor of Philosophy in the School of Mechanical Engineering Georgia Institute of Technology June, 1974 Reproduced with permission of the copyright owner.
